question: The tattoos on my arms will be exposed
answer:
QUESTION

Im am a revert to islam and about to visit mecca/medina to complete my first umra.before i reverted i was tattooed heavily on my forearms naturally my arms will be exposed and i have concerns and worries how this will be percieved.is it permisable to cover to cover my arms at the kibla? youre advice would be appreciated.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is in fact advisable for you to cover your arms while in Ihram.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
